com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.runner

Class RuleBookRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.Auditor
      • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.runner.AbstractRuleBookRunner
        • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.runner.RuleBookRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleBook
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpringAwareRuleBookRunner

    public class RuleBookRunner
extends AbstractRuleBookRunner
    Runs the POJO Rules in a specified package as a RuleBook.

      • RuleBookRunner

        public RuleBookRunner(java.lang.String rulePackage,
                      java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> subPkgMatch)
        Creates a new RuleBookRunner using the specified package and the default RuleBook.
        Parameters:
        rulePackage - a package to scan for POJO Rules
        subPkgMatch - Predicate that returns true for any subpackages that will be scanned

      • RuleBookRunner

                      java.lang.String rulePackage)
        Creates a new RuleBookRunner using the specified package and the supplied RuleBook.
        Parameters:
        ruleBookClass - the RuleBook type to use as a delegate for the RuleBookRunner
        rulePackage - the package to scan for POJO rules

      • RuleBookRunner

        Parameters:
        ruleBookClass - the RuleBook type to use as a delegate for the RuleBookRunner
        rulePackage - the package to scan for POJO rules
        subPkgMatch - Predicate that returns true for any subpackages that will be scanned
